name: Clickaos
description:
Control your white fellows, click on black bugs to cure them and create more fellows.

How long could you survive?

This game is a submission for Brackey's GameJam 2021.2, our first gamejam.

Authors: https://itch.io/profile/divizdev and https://itch.io/profile/forewar

Special thanks to Eric Matyas from https://soundimage.org/
